column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree from a prestigious university?
Has the founder previously held a leadership role in a startup?
Did the founder co-found the company with a small team?
Has the founder worked full-time at a moderate number of companies?
Does the founder have experience in the technology sector?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Did the founder graduate from an Ivy League institution?
Has the founder served in a C-level role at a public company?
Does the founder have a background in finance or investment management?
